articles.author: Daniel Sims
articles.title: Following cyberattack, Japan is days away from running out of country's favorite beer - TechSpot
articles.description: Asahi, Japan's largest brewery, recently confirmed that it paused operations after a breach of its IT systems. Retailers now warn that the country's most popular beer, Asahi...
articles.content: What just happened? Ransomware attacks have crippled hospitals, schools, and even a US fuel pipeline. Now, the same kind of cybercrime is threatening something as ordinary as beer. The disruption at … [+2409 chars]
